description: Moktada al-Sadr’s party is trying to recast itself as able to deliver badly needed services.
title: Reinventing the Sadrists
title_page: Reinventing the Sadrists - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 9,
In the Sadr City district of Baghdad, a billboard has an image of the Shiite cleric Moktada al-Sadr, second from left. His candidates won 40 seats in last March’s elections.
